markdown:
**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 397 4.0 **Domain** [Water](/Domains.aspx?ID=35) **Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283) **Range** 60 feet **Target** 1 creature **Saving Throw** Fortitude --- You call forth a tremendous wave to move the target either in a body of water or on the ground. The target must attempt a Fortitude save. **Failure** You move the target 5 feet in any direction along the ground or 10 feet in any direction through a body of water.
**Critical Failure** You move the target up to 10 feet in any direction along the ground or 20 feet in any direction through a body of water.
name: Tidal Surge
